data.question: What is the journal title where the research on calixarene monoanions and dianions was published?
data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society

data.question: Who is the corresponding author for the research article on calixarene monoanions and dianions?
What is the main focus of the research article by Tracy A. Hanna and colleagues?
data.answer: The synthesis, complete characterization, and solid state structural and solution conformation determination of calix[n]arenes (n = 4, 6, 8) monoanions and dianions.

data.question: True or False: The research article reports the first mixed-alkali metal calixarene anion.
What method was used to obtain crystals suitable for X-ray analysis in the synthesis of calixarene salts?
data.answer: Slow evaporation of solvents or by pentane diffusion into a THF solution.

data.question: Which calixarene salt showed a solvent effect in its formation according to the research?
True or False: The alkali metal salts of monoanionic calix[6]arenes have high solubility in chloroform.
What was the main challenge in synthesizing the lithium and sodium salts of dianionic calix[6]arene?
data.answer: Their solubility was so low that they could neither be purified by recrystallization nor unambiguously identified by their NMR spectra.

data.question: True or False: All calix[4]arene structures exhibit the cone conformation.
What influences the inversion energies of calixarenes according to the research?
data.answer: The level of deprotonation, ring size, and the nature of the cation.

data.question: True or False: The research found that calix[4]arene anions are exclusively in the cone conformation in solution.
What was used to record temperature-dependent 1H NMR spectra in the study?
data.answer: A Varian XL-300 spectrometer at 300 MHz.

data.question: True or False: The research article provides a comprehensive series of calix[n]arene monoanions and dianions for n = 4, 6, and 8.
What was the main challenge in obtaining 13C NMR spectra for most of the calix[6]arene dianions?
data.answer: It was very difficult to obtain the expected spectra, only two broad peaks at 130 and 125 ppm were observed in the aromatic region.

data.question: True or False: The research article reports the synthesis of the first reported rubidium-calixarene complexes.
What was the main method used for purifying the synthesized calixarene salts?
data.answer: Recrystallization by slow evaporation of solvents or by pentane diffusion.

data.question: True or False: The alkali metal salts of dianionic calix[6]arenes are air-stable.
What was the main solvent used in the synthesis of calixarene salts?
True or False: The research found that the presence of para Bu^t groups on the calixarene decreases the accessibility of an endo metal for external interactions.
What was the main challenge in synthesizing the lithium and sodium salts of dianionic ButC6 according to the research?
data.answer: Their solubility was so low that they could neither be purified by recrystallization nor unambiguously identified by their NMR spectra.
